hooks.command: ~/.cargo/bin/am sync 2>/dev/null; echo 'You have persistent geometric memory via the am MCP server. Previous session transcripts have been auto-synced. Call am_query NOW with a summary of the first user message to recall relevant context from past sessions. Do this BEFORE responding or exploring the codebase. During the session, call am_buffer with substantive exchange pairs. After meaningful technical responses, call am_activate_response to strengthen memory connections.'
